videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: Selfmill just got a huge upgrade.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a blue/black/green or Sultai selfmill deck, featuring Urborg Lhurgoyf, Huskburster Swarm and Glarb, Calamity's Augur from Bloomburrow in Standard. 

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Deck Tech
04:23 - Match 1
11:20 - Match 2
15:05 - Match 3

23:51 - Match 5
30:00 - Match 6

38:22 - Match 8
42:11 - Match 9
